full_transcript: Yeah, I know it's expensive. Carbon nanotubes are just... they're hard to make, you know? But it's really good stuff. I mean, if you want the best, you have to pay for it. I'm not really sure how else to explain the price difference, other than it's a premium product from a premium company. We can talk about a discount if you buy in bulk, maybe?
